title: What are some analog electronic or mixed signal electronic graduation project ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. How about designing an analog noise cancellation unit? Try to use OP-AMPs and not off the shelf TBAXXXX audio-amps. You can use RC passive filters to design your frequency response. Make sure you brush-up your Laplace and Fourier transforms.I’ve always been a interested in power supply designs. You can use TTL logics to implement over voltage/over current protection circuits (don’t use MCUs). If you’re feeling a little more inspired, you can include WiFi based power monitoring systems using ESP-8266/ESP-32Microcontroller based TRIAC firing angle control for AC power regulation. The beauty of MCU based design is, that you can use BLE or WiFi clients to remotely control the circuit.There are a lot more like this!

Depends what your interests are. Some ideas that spring to mind: Multi channel MPPT battery charger circuit.Modulator for class D audio amplifier (definitely mixed signal)Closed loop brushless motor driver for robotics or automation applicationsAnalog computer for application specific purpose (e.g. compute a ballistic firing solution)Software defined radio receiver front end module
